response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you and the unique features it offers, I am extending a special offer to sell it to you at $1,350,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure you receive a fair deal while maximizing the return on my investment. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1350000}
